name: Melissa Cox
text: Love the food! Joseph is always fast on delivery. friendly staff, inviting atmosphere, decent prices. Love the hot deals and coupons that cone in the mail. If they make a mistake which has happened a few times they give you a coupon flyer …More

name: Lesley Quinn
text: They have THE BEST pizza in Warsaw!!  Granddaughters love Marco's pizza better than any other.   Also,  you receive a free move from Family Video.

name: Chirag Patel
text: Great customer service. Had really good deals when order over the phone. No sitting area. Great pizza.

name: Lori Miller
text: Excellent pizza, definitely the best in town. Staff is incredibly friendly and they program your number into their system and remember your previous order making it easy to reorder. They also regularly have excellent coupon codes online-their large pizzas are perfect for two people!

name: Joseph Chemerys
text: Best pizza place in town by far! So much better flavor than the others, and you get what's in the picture is that they publish, not something less than that.

name: Ashleigh Roberts
text: I honestly loved the place until today, I placed a order and the guy never asked if it was for delivery or carryout. He assumed that it was a carryout and went ahead and charged my card. He then went on to tell me itll take 2 days for the money to be put back on my card.. will not be ordering from here again.

name: Amanda Popenfoose
text: Our family loves this place! The pizza is always made perfectly at a great pace. The staff has always been friendly to my husband and I. The only thing keeping me from doing 5 stars is because I've not yet had delivery from here but I see it happening in the near future.

name: Debbie Swihart
text: Great friendly service. Love the cheesy bread with jalapeno ranch sauce. Pizza is pretty darn good too !!

name: Jose Cervantes
text: Mmmmmm nice food and the service is exelent

name: Christopher Foreman
text: Their Iltalian sub is really good plus if you spend ok very $10 you get a five  night rental on movies with the same colored sticker.

name: Jordan Mayfield
text: Always great customer service! Beats Papa John's in Warsaw hands down in the way they care for the customer.

name: James Boose
text: Love the free movie with pizza purchase! -makes it all worthwhile.

name: john regan
text: Good God, thin crust is of the chain. The suace holds it down tight. Found my new pizza joint.

name: Tara Alvarez
text: Marcos pizza has inexperienced staff who make mistakes at the cost of the clients and are unwilling to make up for the inconvenience they cause. The manager is young and dumb as well  careless and doesnt see a probem with his staff although …More

name: Joanne Stewart
text: New in town and we got coupons for this place and decided to give it a try. We had a pizza, the meatball bake, cheesy bread and the antipasto salad. All were delicious. And we got a free movie with it. Will be visiting again.

name: Ben Wilson
text: Marco's Pizza is really good! I've gotten in a couple times since they opened. The sausage are big chunks and the crust is really good. Price is a little high, but the sizes are really large.

name: Nick Keleher
text: Good food at a good $

name: Michelle Butts
text: Always friendly, always perfectly made!

name: MaryBeth Nelson
text: Thought I would try the new place in town... Don't waste your time or money.  Crust tastes like cardboard, barely any sauce . Just blah!

name: Kent Coldren
text: Excellent service! Some of the best pizza in town!

name: Claudia Moser
text: We thought the pizza, sauce and crust were great. Real Italian sausage.

name: Hayden Harter
text: So of the best pizza I have eaten yum

name: Jared Brumfield
text: Excellent food. Quick delivery time

name: Josh Shepherd
text: Good place and good food

name: Avery Robbins
text: Really enjoyed the pizza at Marco's. Awesome addition to Warsaw.

name: Kevin Sutherlin
text: Great pizza, wonderful staff, and fast delivery

name: kecldr3
text: Delicious pizza. Kind of expensive but worth it.

name: ryan flora
text: Hands down the best in town!!

name: Dan Shock
text: Best service around.

name: Kandy Hast
text: Closed!!!

name: Krystal Tagler
text: Prices are to high

name: Chris Grindle
text: Delicious

name: Staci Smith
text: Great BBQ Chicken Pizza!!!

name: Sarah Lockridge
text: Great pizza!

name: Reader XX
text: BEST FOOD EVER!!!

name: Jeff & Dee Sheetz custom Transport
text: considering the store had multiple phone issues today, after calling them through my computer I was able to get my order placed, the gentleman on the phone was very apologetic and took my order without any other delays I strongly encourage everybody to give them a  try look forward to trying the full experience again
